roleset.name: successful in creating a desired effect

example.name: both args with EXT
example.text: They note that it is 87 % effective in preventing people in that range from getting the flu at all but people in the 18 - 49 range only had lessened symptoms .
example.arg: in preventing people in that range from getting the flu at all

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, effect-v.01.
